snippet: The Museum of the City of New York announced the opening of an online-only show of its extensive holdings of the work of two couturiers: Charles Frederick Worth and Main Rousseau Bocher, the designer known as Mainbocher.
abstract: The Museum of the City of New York announced the opening of an online-only show of its extensive holdings of the work of two couturiers: Charles Frederick Worth and Main Rousseau Bocher, the designer known as Mainbocher.

headline.main: A New Perspective on Two Couturiers
